name: Forgotten Memories
description:
You awaken on a mysterious island, surrounded by strangers, with no memory of who you are. A local village takes you in, but haunting nightmares drive you to explore deeper into the island's forests. Embark on an epic journey and uncover the island's secrets. Delve into dungeons filled with dragonkin, magic, and ancient artifacts. Fight the forces of evil and unravel your enigmatic past. But be warned, you may uncover memories best left forgotten. Will you be able to piece it all together before it's too late, or will you succumb to the darkness that threatens to consume everything?

Key Features


  • Hack n’ Slash
  • Puzzle
  • Exploration
  • Magic
  • Steam Deck Ready
  • Immersive story and lore
